description: Coach McKenzie wasn't expecting to be seduced by his students today, but Chad Ryans and Nicholas Starr are anxious to get out of practice and willing to do anything to get their wish, even if it means putting the moves on their hunky straight coach. title: CitiBoyz 40: Str8 Boys, Gay Secrets, Scene #06
